Oakland.SAE Expression College: SAE Expression College is a for-profit college located in Emeryville, California, geared toward the entertainment industry and known for its around-the-clock schedule and eight week terms. It offers five Bachelor of Applied Science degrees: 1) Animation & Visual Effects, 2) Digital Filmmaking, 3) Game Art & Design, 4) Interactive Audio, and 5) Sound Arts. SAE Expression College awards Bachelor's degrees after 36 months (two and a half years) of accelerated education.
